name: wakefully

in the manner of someone who is not sleeping or not able to sleep: I could hear my upstairs neighbour wakefully pacing in his bedroom very late at night. He lay in bed very wakefully all night, staring at the ceiling.
More examplesFewer examplesThey lay wakefully in the dark of the tent, telling stories until the sun rose. She lay wakefully, watching shadows move across the walls. They took turns wakefully keeping watch on him throughout the night.
